Uses of Class
com.appriskgame.model.GameMap

  • Packages that use GameMap 
    Package Description
    com.appriskgame.services  

    • Uses of GameMap in com.appriskgame.services

      Methods in com.appriskgame.services that return GameMap 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      GameMap MapOperations.createFile()
      This Method is used to create the new file.
      GameMap MapOperations.editMap()
      editMap is to make the changes as per the player's choice.
      GameMap MapValidation.getMapGraph()
      This Method used to get the Game Map.
      GameMap MapOperations.loadFile()
      This Method is used to load the existing file.
      GameMap MapOperations.readGameMap(java.lang.String inputGameMapName)
      readGameMap method is to load the contents of Continents, Countries and neighboring countries
      Methods in com.appriskgame.services with parameters of type GameMap 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void StartupPhase.gamePlay(GameMap gameMap)
      This method starts the game by obtaining the number of players and taking the input from the players and initialize them.
      void StartupPhase.initialArmyAllocation(GameMap gameMap)
      This method is used to assign armies to the countries so that each country will get at least one army according to the game rule.
      void StartupPhase.populateCountries(GameMap gameMap)
      This method is used to assign countries to the players Random allocation of countries to players will take place in this method.
      void StartupPhase.showMap(GameMap gameMap)
      This method is used show the details of the countries and continents, armies on each country, ownership of each country.
      void FortificationPhase.startGameFortification(GamePlayer player, GameMap gameMap)
      This method is called from the Startup phase when the user opts to start the fortification.
      void ReinforcementPhase.startReinforcement(GamePlayer player, GameMap mapDetails)
      This method asks the player to be continued with Reinforcement phase.
